greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n! * [x^n] 1 - 1/(n - 1/(exp(x) - 1)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Robert Gill, The number of elements in a generalized partition semilattice, Discrete mathematics 186.1-3 (1998): 125-134. See Example 1.
maple: seq(coeff(series(factorial(n)*(1-1/(n-1/(exp(x)-1))),x,n+1), x, n), n = 0 .. 15); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Oct 29 2018
mathematica: Join[{1}, Table[Sum[StirlingS2[n, k] k! n^(k - 1), {k, n}], {n, 16}]]
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if(n==0, 1, sum(k=0, n, k!*n^(k-1)*stirling(n, k, 2)))} \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Jun 12 2020
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 29 2018
